call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA (COMMUNITY EDITION) - July 24th

commitments.commitment: Jump on the Ergo book and do some writing
commitments.quote: now I can jump again on the Ergo book and well, do some stuff there

commitments.commitment: Build a custom page on VoltPay for Keystone to accept multi-chain payments
commitments.quote: They want me to build a custom page for them on VoltPay so they can accept multi-chain payments and sell keystones

commitments.commitment: Talk to the mug maker about accepting Mew payments
commitments.quote: I will talk to the guy who makes mugs

commitments.commitment: See if Echo can be convinced to add Mew to proof of merch
commitments.quote: I will see if I can convince Echo to add maybe Mew to proof of merch

commitments.commitment: Create a new interface on top of MewMart to show it like a DEX
commitments.quote: I just wanted to create a new interface on top of it to show it like a DEX

open_questions.question: Who will use ChainCash and how to do UI
open_questions.context: ChainCash development is blocked on defining users and UI

open_questions.question: How to transition from selected guards to permissionless guards in Rosen
open_questions.context: Question about moving from federated system to trustless system

open_questions.question: How many people will actually use order-based DEX aggregator
open_questions.context: Uncertainty about adoption of running own matching engine

key_facts.fact: Keystone wallet integration with Nautilus estimated 4-6 weeks to completion
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Latest Keystone update from July 21st shows signing with Nautilus working, remaining items are bug fixing, UI design, and integration tests
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: SigmaLock project has been worked on for about a year, with most work done in the last month
key_facts.speaker: MGpai

key_facts.fact: SigmaLock indexing framework written from scratch in Go language with mempool support
key_facts.speaker: MGpai

key_facts.fact: Hummingbot should be open to new connectors in version 2.8, currently released version 2.7
key_facts.speaker: Armeanio
